title: Are You Changing Your Child's Last Name
itunes:title: Are You Changing Your Child's Last Name
description:
Today on the show we had Master P and his son Romeo stop by where they spoke about giving back to the community, leaving growing up hip-hop and more. Also, after a clip of model Eva Marcille came out about her switching her child's last name to her now husbands last name, we opened up the phone lines to see if there is ever a good reason to change the last name. Also, Charlamagne, gave "Donkey of the Day" to Jack Brewer who claimed Donald Trump as the "First Black President".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Today on the show we had Master P and his son Romeo stop by where they spoke about giving back to the community, leaving growing up hip-hop and more. Also, Charlamagne, gave "Donkey of the Day" to Jack Brewer who claimed Donald Trump as the "First Black President".
